36.eng-name: The Book of the Kind Treatment of Women

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'O Umm Salamah, do not bother me about 'Aishah, for by Allah, the Revelation has never come to me under the blanket of any of you apart from her

chapter.ara-name: باب حُبِّ الرَّجُلِ بَعْضَ نِسَائِهِ أَكْثَرَ مِنْ بَعْضٍ
chapter.eng-name: When A Man Loves One Of His Wives More Than Another
